name: Beyond Pearl Harbor: Pacific Warriors
storyline: In the days following the surprise attack on Pearl Harbor, the US Navy mobilized it's entire fleet to deliver a definitive response to Japan's treacherous and brutal bombing. They met the enemy in a new battleground - the expanses of the South Pacific. Join these heroes as a US fighter pilot and exact revenge for your slain comrades. Defeat Japanese Zeros in fast-paced dogfights, destroy gun embankments on the Mariana Islands, and down fully-loaded lumbering bombers bent on reaching US shores. Five white knuckled missions await - start as a P-40 fighter pilot and graduate to command the most advanced flying arsenal of the day. The balance of power in the Pacific rests in your hands. Will you control the skies Beyond Pearl Harbor?
summary: Imagine the classic Arcade game 1942 in 3D.
